backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with access‑controlled user profiles, admin role assignment, and role/authorization queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, involved files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of many frontend components and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_ROOT_CAUSE.md: Explains the frontend build failure causes and documents the fixes applied to restore successful production deployment.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, social tags, cache‑control headers, and script bootstrapping.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST.md: Post‑deployment smoke test checklist for verifying UI rendering, assets, interactions, and responsiveness.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with a root layout and marketing page route wrapped in a ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and iconized UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time profile setup that saves a user’s name with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/Section.t: Reusable layout wrapper rendering section spacing, optional headers, and merged class names using cn().
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with logo, navigation shortcuts, social link, and copyright note.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with navigation, mobile menu toggle, and CTA button.
frontend/src/components/primitives/Butto: Reusable button component supporting variants, sizes, and custom classes.
Card layout primitives providing styled wrappers for headers, content, and footers.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section displaying title and descriptive paragraphs from COPY content.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section with card layout offering email and social media contact links.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with headline, subheadline, CTA buttons, and illustration image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Process overview rendering numbered steps using cards from COPY content.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Services grid showing service cards with icons, descriptions, and benefits.
frontend/src/content/copy.ts: Centralized text content for hero, services, process, about, and contact sections.
frontend/src/content/labels.ts: Shared UI labels for navigation and CTA text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCallerAdmin.ts: Uses react-query to check if the current authenticated caller has admin privileges via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/navigation.ts: Exports static navigation item definitions using label constants.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInboxPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page component for an admin inbox.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingPage.tsx: Renders the main marketing page composed of multiple section components.
frontend/src/utils/smokeCheck.ts: Runs basic DOM presence checks for key UI elements and logs results for post-deployment smoke testing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, known issues, and deployment-related feature requirements.
